articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine administered to first 5 frontline UPMC workers - WPXI Pittsburgh
articles.description: The first five UPMC employees were administered Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine, after the vaccines arrived in the area Monday.
articles.content:
PITTSBURGH — Five UPMC employees were the first in the state to be administered Pfizers COVID-19 vaccine, after the vaccines arrived in the area Monday.
UPMC received 975 doses of the vaccine Monday… [+4024 chars]

articles.title: Extreme levels of 'friendly fire' from the body's immune system may cause 'long Covid' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Coronavirus patients have high numbers of 'autoantibodies' in their blood which block the body's Covid-tackling antibodies and attack several areas, a US study found.
articles.content:
Extreme levels of 'friendly fire' antibodies in the immune system could trigger severe coronavirus symptoms and cause 'long Covid', scientists say.
